perturbation.original_text:
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text:
If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter,
Bank of America may terminate this Schedule. Project Personnel:
perturbation.explanation: By moving 'Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder' to the 'Project Personnel' section, the right to terminate the schedule and receive a refund is now unclearly linked to price increases, potentially affecting its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clear and conspicuous terms, specifically regarding termination clauses.

perturbation.original_text:
The Customizations identified hereunder shall be
subject to the terms and conditions of that Software License, Customization and Maintenance Agreement referenced above.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Customizations identified hereunder shall be
subject to the terms and conditions of that Software License, Customization and Maintenance Agreement referenced above. Project Personnel:
perturbation.explanation: By including the original text from 'The Customizations...' to Project Personnel section, we moved the actual Customizations' terms in the wrong sections. That means that it may affect its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Agreement terms and conditions.

perturbation.changed_text:
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:
Delivery Date:  
Installation Date:  
[Insert any other Schedule Information pertaining to the Delivery or Installation of the Product]. Project Personnel:
perturbation.explanation: By including the original text from 'The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:' to Project Personnel section, we moved the actual Delivery and Installation terms in the wrong sections. That means that it may affect its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Agreement terms and conditions.
